benchmark_details.name: Bench4KE
benchmark_details.overview: Bench4KE is an extensible API-based benchmarking system for Knowledge Engineering (KE) automation focused on evaluating tools that generate Competency Questions (CQs) automatically, providing a standardized framework to assess their quality using a curated gold standard dataset.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized and extensible evaluation framework for Knowledge Engineering automation tasks, particularly for the generation of Competency Questions.

data.source: Gold standard datasets from four real-world ontology projects combined with user stories and domain-specific datasets.
data.annotation: Manually crafted by ontology engineers from real-world projects.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are computed by comparing generated CQs against gold standard CQs using various similarity measures.
methodology.interpretation: The evaluation results quantify the quality of generated CQs by measuring their semantic similarity to manually crafted CQs.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparative performance metrics of four LLM-based CQ generation systems were established.
methodology.validation: Bench4KE supports various evaluation scenarios using user stories and structured datasets.
